title: [FEATURE] SKDXElement?
body:
### Is your feature request related to a problem?

Can you provide an example about how to use the new directx backend? in particular in a wpf context

### Describe the solution you would like

I'd like use directx on windows

### Describe alternatives you have considered

I'm using SKGLElement but I'm developing on windows only

### Additional context

_No response_

### Code of Conduct

- [x] I agree to follow this project's Code of Conduct
